languages.text: {n}Мозговое вещество растекается по вашему рту, проскальзывает в пищевод... и немедленно вызывает приступ тошноты. Вы с трудом сдерживаетесь, чтобы не опустошить желудок перед всеми. К глазам подступают слезы, в глазах темнеет — и ваши мучения не ускользают от Маражая, который ловит каждую крупицу вашего страдания.{/n}

{n}The brain matter spills inside your mouth, slips down into your gullet... and instantly triggers a wave of nausea. You barely stop yourself from losing the contents of your stomach with everyone watching. Your eyes tear up, and your vision goes dark — and not a shred of your suffering escapes Marazhai's notice as he savours every shift in your expression.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мозговое вещество растекается по вашему рту, проскальзывает в пищевод... и немедленно вызывает приступ тошноты. Вы с трудом сдерживаетесь, чтобы не опустошить желудок перед всеми. К глазам подступают слезы, в глазах темнеет — и ваши мучения не ускользают от Маражая, который ловит каждую крупицу вашего страдания.{/n}

languages.text: {n}脑浆涌如你的口腔，滑入你的喉咙……让你仿佛要吐了出来。在所有人的注视之下，你勉强控制住自己，没让胃里的东西吐出来。你的眼泪夺眶而出，眼前一片漆黑。你的痛苦一点都没有逃过玛拉斋的眼睛，他仔细品味着你的每个表情变化。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The brain matter spills inside your mouth, slips down into your gullet... and instantly triggers a wave of nausea. You barely stop yourself from losing the contents of your stomach with everyone watching. Your eyes tear up, and your vision goes dark — and not a shred of your suffering escapes Marazhai's notice as he savours every shift in your expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}脑浆涌如你的口腔，滑入你的喉咙……让你瞬间恶心不已。在所有人的注视之下，你勉强控制住自己，没让胃里的东西吐出来。你的眼泪夺眶而出，眼前一片漆黑。你的痛苦一点都没有逃过玛拉斋的眼睛，他仔细品味着你的每个表情变化。{/n}

languages.text: {n}口の中に入れた脳漿から汁が出て、食道へと落ちていき…瞬時に猛烈な吐き気に襲われた。皆が見ている中、やっとの思いで胃の内容物を吐き出さないよう堪える。目は涙ぐんだせいで視界が暗くなった。マラズハイはあなたの変化する苦しみの表情全てを、舐めるように見ていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The brain matter spills inside your mouth, slips down into your gullet... and instantly triggers a wave of nausea. You barely stop yourself from losing the contents of your stomach with everyone watching. Your eyes tear up, and your vision goes dark — and not a shred of your suffering escapes Marazhai's notice as he savours every shift in your expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}口の中に入れた脳漿から汁が出て、食道へと落ちていき…瞬時に猛烈な吐き気に襲われた。皆が見ている中、やっとの思いで胃の内容物を吐き出さないよう堪える。目は涙ぐんだせいで視界が暗くなった。マラズハイはあなたの変化する苦しみの表情全てを、舐めるように見ていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La masa cerebral se derrama por tu boca, se desliza por tu garganta y provoca en ti una oleada de nauseas al instante. Apenas consigues mantener el contenido de tu estómago en su sitio ante la mirada de todos. Tus ojos se llenan de lágrimas y tu visión se oscurece. Ni una pizca de sufrimiento escapa la mirada de Marazhai, que saborea cada cambio en tu expresión.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The brain matter spills inside your mouth, slips down into your gullet... and instantly triggers a wave of nausea. You barely stop yourself from losing the contents of your stomach with everyone watching. Your eyes tear up, and your vision goes dark — and not a shred of your suffering escapes Marazhai's notice as he savours every shift in your expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La masa cerebral se derrama por tu boca, se desliza por tu garganta y provoca en ti una oleada de nauseas al instante. Apenas consigues mantener el contenido de tu estómago en su sitio ante la mirada de todos. Tus ojos se llenan de lágrimas y tu visión se oscurece. Ni una pizca de sufrimiento escapa la mirada de Marazhai, que saborea cada cambio en tu expresión.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Gehirnmasse glibbert in deinen Mund, rutscht deine Speiseröhre hinunter ... und löst sofort einen Schwall der Übelkeit aus. Nur mit größter Mühe kannst du verhindern, dass du vor aller Augen deinen Magen entleerst. Tränen schießen dir in die Augen und wir schwarz vor Augen — und kein Fitzelchen deines Leids entgeht Marazhais Aufmerksamkeit, der jede Veränderung deiner Miene voll auskostet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The brain matter spills inside your mouth, slips down into your gullet... and instantly triggers a wave of nausea. You barely stop yourself from losing the contents of your stomach with everyone watching. Your eyes tear up, and your vision goes dark — and not a shred of your suffering escapes Marazhai's notice as he savours every shift in your expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Gehirnmasse glibbert in deinen Mund, rutscht deine Speiseröhre hinunter ... und löst sofort einen Schwall der Übelkeit aus. Nur mit größter Mühe kannst du verhindern, dass du vor aller Augen deinen Magen entleerst. Tränen schießen dir in die Augen und wir schwarz vor Augen — und kein Fitzelchen deines Leids entgeht Marazhais Aufmerksamkeit, der jede Veränderung deiner Miene voll auskostet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous mâchez le morceau de cervelle et l'avalez... mais êtes instantanément {mf|pris|prise} de nausée. Vous vous retenez de justesse de vomir devant tout le monde. Vos yeux se mettent à larmoyer, votre vision s'assombrit... et Marazhai n'en perd pas une miette, savourant avec délectation chaque expression de votre visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The brain matter spills inside your mouth, slips down into your gullet... and instantly triggers a wave of nausea. You barely stop yourself from losing the contents of your stomach with everyone watching. Your eyes tear up, and your vision goes dark — and not a shred of your suffering escapes Marazhai's notice as he savours every shift in your expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous mâchez le morceau de cervelle et l'avalez... mais êtes {mf|pris|prise} d'une nausée soudaine. Vous vous retenez de justesse de vomir devant tout le monde. Vos yeux se mettent à larmoyer, votre vision s'assombrit... et Marazhai n'en perd pas une miette, savourant avec délectation chaque expression de votre visage.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Beyin; ağzına yayılıyor, boğazından geçiyor ve... Anında midenin bulanmasına sebep oluyor. Herkesin gözü önünde midendekileri ortalığa saçmamak için kendini zor tutuyorsun. Gözlerin yaşarıyor, görüşün kararıyor ve bu acının tek bir zerresi bile yüz ifadendeki değişimlerin tek tek tadını çıkaran Marazhai'ın dikkatinden kaçmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The brain matter spills inside your mouth, slips down into your gullet... and instantly triggers a wave of nausea. You barely stop yourself from losing the contents of your stomach with everyone watching. Your eyes tear up, and your vision goes dark — and not a shred of your suffering escapes Marazhai's notice as he savours every shift in your expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Beyin, ağzına yayılıyor, boğazından geçiyor ve... Anında midenin bulanmasına sebep oluyor. Herkesin gözü önünde midendekileri ortalığa saçmamak için kendini zar zor engelliyorsun. Gözlerin yaşarıyor, görüşün kararıyor ve bu acının tek bir zerresi bile, yüz ifadendeki değişimlerin tek tek tadını çıkaran Marazhai'ın dikkatinden kaçmıyor.{/n}
